attributes.action: Keep 5 years route of ILR for refugees already granted Asylum
attributes.additional_details: Because the government and parliament they make policies and they have control of it
attributes.background: The Government should not apply these new rules on refugees who are already here in the uk and have been granted asylum and are on the route to ILR.They should look into this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Keep the 5-Year ILR route for refugees. Do not extend it to 10 or 20 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751443
